preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 160 g of As2O8 and place in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 2. Add 20 g of Pa to the container. 
 3. Finally, add 10 g of Rb. 
 4. Use a mechanical mixer to blend the materials thoroughly for 10 minutes, ensuring an even mixture.
